name: Uncanny Morshu
desc: A lantern’s petrol, a bomb made with lead; Accompanied by a rope of fine thread; The three artefacts to kill what is dead; To imbue their souls with eternal dread.; They writhe in unison, yet they cannot cry, All simply because t’were too poor to buy. And Death cannot help them, he would not dare try; For he has one rule: let sleeping dogs lie.
author: LoDef#7624
